sources.title: Fangs of the Wild (1954) Charles Chaplin Jr. | Adventure, Family, Thriller | Full length movie
sources.description:
Beast against man!
Tad Summers, son of mountain lodge owner Jim Summers, sees Roger Wharton kill his supposed best friend. Tad tells his father, who doesn't believe him, but Linda Wharton, Roger's wife, does and taunts him into a confession. Roger sets out to get rid of the boy.

Director: William F. Claxton
Writers: William F. Claxton, Orville H. Hampton
Stars: Charles Chaplin Jr., Onslow Stevens, Margia Dean
Genres: Adventure, Family, Thriller, Western
